description: The Generator Subsidy scheme in Tamil Nadu provides financial assistance to MSMEs for purchasing generators to ensure uninterrupted power supply for their operations. The scheme aims to enhance productivity and operational efficiency.
key_features: Support for MSMEs to maintain operations

benefits.subsidy: 25% of the cost of the generator, up to a maximum of Rs. 5 Lakhs
benefits.one_time_assistance: Subsidy provided one time per MSME

business_criteria: Must be a registered MSME as per the MSME Development Act, 2006
Must be located in Tamil Nadu
operational_criteria: Must purchase a new generator for business operations
Generator must meet Tamil Naduâ€™s regulatory standards

eligible_activities: Purchase of new generators for MSME operations

steps: Visit the Tamil Nadu MSME portal or Industries Department website
Submit an online application with details of the generator purchase
Upload required documents, including MSME registration and purchase invoices
Applications are reviewed by the District Industries Centre (DIC)
Approved applicants receive the subsidy upon verification
application_process.note: Applications must be submitted within one year of purchase

special_notes: The subsidy is limited to one generator per MSME
Generators must comply with environmental and safety norms
MSMEs must provide proof of installation
